resources.string: Congratulations! Your phone is rooted. We will ask for the root permission next. If you choose to deny it, the app will still work, but there will be a prompt before each app is uninstalled.\nUnfortunately, this is a limitation of the Android system

Your phone is not rooted. The app will still work, but there will be a prompt before each app is uninstalled. Unfortunately, this is a limitation of the Android system However, this process will still be faster than uninstalling them from the settings menu
Are you sure you want to uninstall these app(s)?
Simple batch uninstaller app to uninstall multiple apps at once. Works best if rooted\n\nThis app is open source. Check out the source code from the link below
If you find this app useful, you can donate via Bitcoin. Donation doesn\'t provide any additional benefits.Press the button below to copy the bitcoin address to your clipboard
System apps can only be restored to original installed version, cannot be uninstalled completely without root permission
Uninstalling system app can completely crash the device. Deselect if you are not sure.
